Aug. 5, 1907 D Pontypridd Contest (Class A)
Pontypridd Contest (Class A) 10 Test Piece Contest Pontypridd Contest pontypridd-contest-class-a
Test Piece Contest
Gems from Sullivan's Operas No. 1
Pontypridd, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK
1st prize £30 and shield. 2nd prize £15. 3rd prize £10. 3 bands competed.
March 31, 2012, 6:47 a.m. July 4, 2015, 7:40 p.m.
